title.en: Do You Like Fluffy Oppai? Busty Girl Anthology Comic

altTitles.en: Do You Like Drooping Breasts? Busty Girl Anthology Comic
Do You Like Fluffy Boobs? Busty Girl Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja-ro: Tawawa na Oppai ha Suki Desuka

altTitles.ja: たわわなおっぱいは好きですか？
たわわなおっぱいは好きですか？ 巨乳少女 アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.ru: А ты любишь пышные груди? Сборник комиксов про грудастых девчонок

altTitles.pt-br: Você Gosta de Peitos Caídos? Antologia de Garotas Peitudas

altTitles.ja-ro: Tawawa na Oppai wa Suki desu ka? Kyonyuu Shoujo Anthology Comic

description.en:
In a swimsuit, a bunny girl, and clothes that kill virgins.   
A little naughty anthology comic of girls in various situations and costumes by 9 writers!

Volume 1 (2017/07/27)
#Cover illustration: Nanase Meruchi
1. Tawawa!? na Hoshuu Jugyou (たわわ!? な補習授業) [Kiso Fumihiro]
2. Docchi no Futago Show (どっちの双子show) [Nakamura Morisu]
3. Hajimete no Arbeit♪ (はじめてのアルバイト♪) [Kurou]
4. Ushi-chan no Omajinai: Shoutengai Kujibiki-hen (うしちゃんのおまじない～商店街くじ引き編～) [Suihei Sen]
5. Swiling Smiling (Swiling smiling) [Vanilla Bou]
6. Tawawa na Me ni Au Ichinichi (たわわな目に遭う一日) [Byte]
7. Osananajimi ja Tarinai yo (幼なじみじゃ足りないよ) [Takeuchi Junya]
8. Tokusatsu Lovers (特撮LOVERS) [Shouji Nigou]
9. Kawaii no Mahou (カワイイの魔法) [Hamaji Aki]

Volume 2 (2017/12/08)
#Cover illustration: Nanase Meruchi
1. Gyakuten! Love Game (逆転! ラブゲーム) [Kiso Fumihiro]
2. A Lucky Accident (A Lucky Accident) [Minamino Hazuki] (南乃映月)
3. Karakai Gal to Josou Iinchou (からかいギャルと女装委員長) [Mashimaru] (ましまる)
4. Tawawa na Babysitter (たわわなベビーシッター) [Rouka]
5. Osewa no Hitsuyou na Imouto (お世話の必要な義妹) [Ekakibit]
6. Chikasugita Futari no Kyori (近すぎた二人の距離) [Byte]
7. Yuru x Ane (ゆる×あね) [Haseyoshi Eria]
8. Baito-saki no Kawaii Senpai (バイト先のかわいい先輩) [Kurou]

Volume 3 (2018/04/27)
#Cover illustration: Gintarou
1. Tawawa na Haru: Saikai (たわわな春～再会) [Kiso Fumihiro]
2. Gyakuten Theater (逆転シアター) [Nakamura Morisu]
3. Sake wo Majiereba Akaku Naru (酒を交えれば赤くなる) [Mashimaru] (ましまる)
4. Kaikan!? Twins Change (快感!? Twins Change) [Love♥I]
5. Itsumo to Chigau Kaerimichi (いつもと違う帰り道) [Fujishima Shinnosuke]
6. Classmate ga Cosplayer Datta Ken (クラスメイトがコスプレイヤーだった件) [Takaha Momo] (高羽もも)
7. China de Ta Wa Wa (チャイナでた・わ・わ) [Son Yohsyu]
8. Swiling Smiling: Another (Swiling smiling～Another～) [Vanilla Bou]
9. Tawawa Hunter! (たわわハンター!) [Takeuchi Junya]

Volume 4 (2018/07/27)
#Cover illustration: Gintarou
1. Mecha Feti na Kanojo (メカふぇちな彼女) [Yamamoto Yamii]
2. Himitsu no Maki-chan (ひみつのマキちゃん) [Kirikiri Mai]
3. Yoshioka Riri no Shippai Biyori (吉岡梨々のしっパイ日和) [Momoshika Fujiko]
4. One More Time! (ワンモアタイム!) [Yukian]
5. Boku no Karakai Maid-san (僕のからかいメイドさん) [Gokugetsu Momo]
6. Sakuragi-san wa Itsumo Muboubi (桜木さんはいつも無防備) [Love♥I]
7. Hajirai Communication (ハジライコミュニケーション) [Musha Sabu]
8. Tawawa Quest (たわわクエスト) [Kuroseimu] (クロセイム)

Volume 5 (2018/09/27)
#Cover illustration: Kitada Ryouma
1. Mousou Jouzu no Rinko-chan (モーソー上手の凛子ちゃん) [Momoshika Fujiko]
2. Q. Crisis!!! (Q.クライシス!!!) [Toriu Chinori]
3. Sister Conceal (sister conceal) [majoccoid]
4. Osananajimi wa Wanko-kei (幼なじみはわんこ系) [Gokugetsu Momo]
5. Elite Succubus wa Yuuwaku Dekinai (エリートサキュバスは誘惑できない) [Yoshimura Yoshi]
6. Himitsu no Miyabi-chan (ひみつの雅ちゃん) [Love♥I]
7. Dokidoki sasenaide! (ドキドキさせないで!) [Aoshima Kanae]

Volume 6 (2018/11/27)
#Cover illustration: Kitada Ryouma
1. On Off Switching (おんおふスイッチング) [Emua]
2. Mousou Jouzu no Rinko-chan 2 (モーソー上手の凛子ちゃん2) [Momoshika Fujiko]
3. Complex Jump! (Complex jump!) [Kiso Fumihiro]
4. Change My Sister (チェンジ・マイ・シスター) [Kuromura Moto]
5. Imouto no Omoikomi ga Hageshisugiru Ken (妹の思い込みが激しすぎる件) [Nise] (似せ)
6. Boku no Kawaii Vampire (僕のかわいいヴァンパイア) [Sakura Hanatsumi]
7. Oshiete Kudasai! Yoshino-sensei (教えてください! 吉野先生) [Sarfata]

Volume 7 (2019/01/26)
#Cover illustration: Rouka
1. Punishment: Shikou no Bassoku (パニッシュメント -至高の罰則-) [Hashimoto] (橋本)
2. Escape From Cool Beauty (エスケープ・フロム・クールビューティー) [Kuromura Moto]
3. Chara Install! (キャラ・インストール!) [Hirokawa Tomo]
4. Muttsuri Kouhai no Ikenai Kyouchuu (ムッツリ後輩のイケない胸中) [Momoshika Fujiko]
5. Toshiue Youjo ni Miserarete (年上幼女に魅せられて) [Mashimaru] (ましまる)
6. Chameleon Gal (カメレオンギャル) [Fujishima Shinnosuke]
description.pt-br:
De maiô, uma coelhinha e roupas que matam virgens. Um quadrinho de antologia travesso de garotas em várias situações e figurinos de 9 escritores!  
  


---

Cover art: Nanase Meruchi (vol 1,2)  
Vol 1  
||  
1. Kiso Fumihiro  
2. Nakamura Morisu  
3. Kurou  
4. Suiheisen  
5. Vanilla Bow  
6. Byte  
7. Takeuchi Junya  
8. Shouji Nigou  
9. Hamaji Aki  
||  
Vol 2  
||  
1. Kiso Fumihiro  
2. Minamino Hazuki  
3. Mashimaru  
4. Rouka  
5. Ekakibit  
6. Byte  
7. Haseyoshi Eria  
8. Kurou||

Hello!
I mainly draw manga and post them freely!
*Sometimes I don't post for several months, sometimes I post a lot in a short period of time, sometimes I suddenly post something in a different genre, so please be careful if you want to see stable content on a regular basis...!
biography.ja:
こんにちはです！
主に漫画などを描いて気ままに投稿してるところです！
※数か月投稿無かったり、短期間でいろいろ投稿したり、急にジャンル違うの投稿したりしますので、定期的に安定したコンテンツを見たい方はご注意ください・・・！(pixiv)
